Title: Dynamic Variable Evaluation in qiskit-ibm-runtime
Description: An `eval()` method exists `Options._get_program_inputs`. This is bad in any case, but especially bad because `Options` are also used server side, so this has the potential to expose arbitrary code injection in runtime containers, now or at a later time.
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.11.0, all versions starting from 0.11.1
